reviews.text: Drove in late, heading to Gibraltar in the morning. We were 4adults traveling together and stayed in a quad. Room had dormitory feel, tiny stall shower, and noisy at night, but clean. The man at the front desk carried 2 of our 4 suitcases up in the evening, but we had to carry them down at check out. Free parking in drive of hotel. Breakfast toast,jam and choice of beverage, but that is it! if you don't speak spanish,sign language work as check in man spoke english, but at breakfast and check out, we resorted to signs.
reviews.title: good hotel for Gibraltar day trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good thinks: Clean room, friendly staff, they changed our room with broken air-conditioned. They also allowed us to use the reception fridge. Free parking right to hotel door. Perfect hotel for a 1 night stay in transit at the outskirts of Algeciras with easy access to highway.
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bad thinks: Very small room. Nobody speaking English. Very poor breakfast.
reviews.title: Great budget-friendly place

reviews.text: Clean room, free parking on street, free breakfast of hearty toast and choice of beverage. Friendly staff was helpful and conversational over breakfast. Easy to find and neighborhood seemed nice. No complaints!
reviews.title: Good ,Friendly Hotel...

reviews.text: Stayed here for 4 nights while visiting friends.It was booked for me by my friends to be close to their home.Its about 15 minutes walking to center of town in a residencial area.I found it to be clean,friendly,good price and the reception helpful.Breakfast was included and was good. I was quite happy staying here!There are a few supermarkets just round the corner as well and I also saw a bus stop just outside the hotel.Security was good as they buzz you in....If you are looking for a simple but clean and decent place to stay outside city center..try it!
reviews.title: simple, family hotel
